showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:8}); // “Well then, please come again.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:24}); // Elder Bughe
“Where is the Promised Land…?
Maybe Bugenhagen knows.”{PAUSE}“Isn't Nanaki starting to notice?
The reason why Bugenhagen sent him
away from the canyon…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:23}); // Elder Bughe
“Live with the Planet,
die with the Planet.”{PAUSE}“Maybe this is the way it should be.
Who knows? I'm full of booze…”{PAUSE}“It's when I think about the children.
I wonder if we can just
save our own children.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:15}); // Elder Bughe
“You can't talk of the Ancients,
without mentioning Professor Gast.”{PAUSE}“He used to come here sometimes.”{PAUSE}“He was a Shinra scholar who spent
his life studying the Ancients.”{PAUSE}“He was a serious person, you never would
have thought he'd be in Shinra.”{PAUSE}“Must've been about 30 years ago,
when he found the corpse of an Ancient.
He was elated!”{PAUSE}“If I recall…he named it 'Jenova' and
was doing a lot of research…”{PAUSE}“One day, he showed up here,
looking very distressed.”{PAUSE}“He was mumbling something about Jenova
not being an Ancient and that he'd
done a terrible thing…”{PAUSE}“He's been missing since then.
I heard that he never
went back to Shinra”{PAUSE}“So, if you ever see Professor Gast,
I want you to tell him…”{PAUSE}“That the old man that likes to drink
in Cosmo Canyon, wants to hear
about the Ancients.”{PAUSE}“Well, there's lots to talk about,”{PAUSE}“but most things about the Ancients
are all legend and folk tales,
and no one knows the truth.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:14}); // Elder Bughe
“…Hmm.
That's no fun…
I wanna tell a story.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:18}); // Elder Bughe
“By the way, your friends are
all in front of the 'Cosmo Candle'”{PAUSE}“Are you all leaving now?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:17}); // Elder Bughe
“Is that so?
You brought Nanaki back here?”{PAUSE}“Yeah, thanks.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:16}); // Elder Bughe
“Mmm. I'm starting to feel good now.
That bartender's cocktails
always hit the spot.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:25}); // [Turtle's Paradise]
